articles.title: McKinsey and General Catalyst execs say the era of ‘learn once, work forever’ is over
articles.description: Calacanis, General Catalyst's Taneja, and McKinsey's Sternfels discussed how AI is reshaping technology and the labor force.
articles.author: Marina Temkin

articles.title: Meta’s Manus news is getting different receptions in Washington and Beijing
articles.description: Chinese officials are reportedly reviewing whether the Meta deal violates technology export controls, potentially giving Beijing leverage it wasn't
articles.author: Connie Loizos
